name: MalapropQuote(Malapropism)
0:
”Alexa, ask malaprop quote to share something”
”Tell me something humorous”
”Share a phrase”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: malaprop quote
des:
A malapropism is the mistaken use of a word in place of a similar-sounding one, often with unintentionally amusing effect, as in, for example, “dance a flamingo ” (instead of flamenco). This is a verbal collection of the infamous malapropisms.

Just say, "Alexa, open Malaporp Quote." Once you've opened the skill, you can ask Alexa to share a phrase with you by saying:

"Share a phrase"
"Tell me something humorous"
or simply "Malaprop Quote"
